trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC805_01029_SEQ_00<tab>Ahtzatrach seeks a sword hand swift and stout.
TEXT_GAIUSC805_01029_SEQ_01<tab>Ahtzatrach hopes to chip away at the Serpent Reavers' numbers prior to battle, and asks you to slay five of their kind.
TEXT_GAIUSC805_01029_SEQ_02<tab>You have done the deed. Report your success to Ahtzatrach.
TEXT_GAIUSC805_01029_SEQ_03<tab>Ahtzatrach is elated that the Serpent Reavers will need to lick their wounds a bit.
TEXT_GAIUSC805_01029_AHTZATRACH_000_000<tab>Serpent Reavers are pirates who take the Sahagin's god as their own. What sorry sort of pirate offers prayers to Leviathan?
TEXT_GAIUSC805_01029_AHTZATRACH_000_001<tab>Like all zealots, their fervor grows with their numbers. Subtracting five fanatics from their fold ought to dampen their fire a while.
TEXT_GAIUSC805_01029_AHTZATRACH_000_020<tab>That'll teach those Reavers that they reap what they sow! Rest assured in the knowledge you've made the seas safer for all.
